Title: Colonial Day
Plot: When President Roslin calls an Interim Quorum of the Twelve Colonies, she discovers that democracy brings its ugly stepsisters ? politics and deadly intrigue ? to the party. Tom Zarek, the charismatic convicted terrorist, is elected as the delegate from Sagittaron and immediately proposes elections for the vice-presidency.
GuestStars: Richard Hatch, Kate Vernon, Robert Wisden, David Kaye, Alex Zahara, Patrick Gallagher, Malcolm Stewart, Michael Hogan
